benj 0.0.6
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    autoHeatmap()

    Automatic heatmap

    bed.dump()

    Dump genomic ranges to BED6+

    bed.slurp()

    Slurp BED file into a GenomicRanges object

    bulk_aggregate()

    Aggregate bulk RNA-seq into SummarizedExperiment

    bulk_aggregate_star()

    List BMC filenames in batch directory

    calc_binomial_CI()

    Binomial CI estimation wilson score interval as taken from Carles Boix;Pouya Kheradpour

    calculate_qc_metrics()

    Calculate qc metrics similar to Scanpy

    createGeneAnnotationGFF()

    Create annotation from GTF or GFF file

    deg()

    Run DEGs, switching on the method

    deg.deseq2()

    Run DESeq2 on pseudobulked data

    deg.dysregulation()

    Idea: use corrected counts to

    deg.edger()

    Run edgeR on a SummarizedExperiment

    deg.extract.covariates.from.design()

    When a design matrix is filtered, we need to be able to extract the covariates used for MAST::zlm. Here, we use the filtered design to find if any columns have been themselves filtered.

    deg.filter.design()

    Filtering of design matrix for DEG comparisons This method modifies a design matrix such that combinations or unused comparisons are removed. It also renames items with spaces because some DEG methods complain about spaces in the design matrix.

    deg.filter.outliers()

    Filter outlying samples from a pseudobulk SummarizedExperiment. This method uses covariates only, and finds distance from the centroid in PCA space

    deg.mast()

    Run MAST on a SingleCellExperiment object

    deg.nebula()

    Run Nebula on a SummarizedExperiment

    deg.prepare()

    Prepare SummarizedExperiment object for DEG calling.

    deg.ruvseq()

    Add RUVseq columns to SummarizedExperiment Based on Carles Boix's RUVSeq workflow

    diag.mat3()

    Diagonally cluster the matrix

    .decompress_indptr()

    Take indptr from H5AD and turn into a dense index Take in indptr assuming it is integer64 But use regular integer in rep() as number of compressed indices is not likely going to overflow

    .get_sparse()

    Parse a sparse matrix given indices

    .parse_h5ad_X()

    Parse a matrix given indices

    .parse_h5ad_dataframe()

    Parse H5AD dataframe

    .parse_h5ad_obs()

    Parse observed barcode dataframe

    .parse_h5ad_var()

    Parse variables dataframe

    .summarizeJASPARMotifs()

    Summarize JASPAR motifs as taken from ArchR

    enrichGO()

    Run clusterProfiler::enrichGO with better options and defaults

    enrich_overlap_custom()

    Enrich against a custom range

    enrich_se()

    Enrich SummarizedExperiment by groupby column. Enrichment strategy taken from Carles Boix/Pouya Kheradpour

    get.colors()

    Get named color categories, subsetted by 'select'.

    get_cache_loader()

    Generate a loader for a specified expiration date

    gseGO()

    Run clusterProfiler::gseGO with better options and defaults

    ht_asterisks()

    Draw asterisks Pass cell_fun=ht_asterisks(...) to Heatmap()

    ht_boxplot()

    Draw triangles in heatmap Pass cell_fun=ht_triangle_split(...) to Heatmap()

    ht_triangle_split()

    Draw triangles in heatmap Pass cell_fun=ht_triangle_split(...) to Heatmap()

    load_cached()

    Load RDS file from fname or re-compute and save

    load_multiome_barcodes()

    Loads list of vectors and matrices allowing for easy 10X index lookup.

    make_aggregation_table()

    Make aggregation table

    make_average()

    Collapse a matrix into pseudobulk, such that the resulting matrix is an average

    make_pseudobulk()

    Collapse a matrix into pseudobulk

    make_tiles()

    Make windows similar to bedtools makewindows

    motif_overlap()

    Motif overlap of genomic ranges

    msub()

    Multiple gsub

    order.tsp()

    Reorder a matrix based on TSP solver

    parse.range()

    Parse string range to seqnames, start, end

    peak_annotation()

    Annotate peaks based on GFF

    pivot()

    Pivot a dataframe using Matrix::sparseMatrix

    promoter_enrichment()

    Promoter enrichment of a gene set

    qclip()

    Clip a vector/matrix by quantile

    read_h5ad()

    Read H5AD matrix

    read_h5ad_obs()

    Read H5AD obs

    read_h5ad_parallel()

    Read a list of H5AD files in parallel, then concatenate. Useful for when using subset= and obs= parameters

    read_h5ad_var()

    Read H5AD var

    read_star()

    Load STAR ReadsPerGene into SummarizedExperiment

    repel_text()

    Get ggrepel locations

    reverseComplement()

    Reverse complement

    run.great()

    Run GREAT via rGREAT

    saveGGplot()

    Save ggplot, modified from Carles Boix

    saveHeatmap()

    Save ComplexHeatmap, modified from Carles Boix

    se_concat()

    Concatenate SummarizedExperiment objects, throwing out non-matching rowData columns

    se_gene_ranges()

    Add genomicranges of gene to

    se_log1p()

    Log1p assay similar to Scanpy

    se_make_pseudobulk()

    Pseudobulk a SummarizedExperiment

    se_module_score()

    Calculate module score

    se_normalize_total()

    Normalize data similar to ScanPy

    se_prcomp()

    Runs PCA on the SummarizedExperiment object

    se_tmm()

    Calculate TMM assay in SummarizedExperiment

    se_to_cellranger_h5()

    Save SummarizedExperiment to CellRanger style H5 for transfer to ScanPy

    se_unnormalize()

    Un-normalize SummarizedExperiment using total_counts column

    set_ht_opt()

    Set default heatmap options, modified from Carles Boix

    sra_from_geo()

    Get SRA ID and GEO accession from GEO id

    tss()

    TSS finding

    var_names_make_unique()

    Varnames to names as in Scanpy

    vclip()

    Clip a vector/matrix by values

    volcano()

    Draw volcano plot
